item.description:
This is it !

Iron Man, Captain America, The Hulk, Thor, Black Widow Nick Fury and Hawkeye on the silver screen, all at the same time, directed by Joss Whedon, in the Avengers ! The movie opens this Friday, May 4th, and I want us to go see it together.

I say we go to the Regal Cinema in Westborough at 7:20 for one of the 3D presentations. As previously said, it is massively popular. The Friday tickets are pretty much all gone in the MetroWest area.

Let me know if you want a dinner event before, which I'm, all for at a Westborough restaurant (Bertucci's, UNO's, Outback). Once you confirm, head to this link to purchase your ticket:

 

https://www.fandango.com/transaction/ticketing/redvines/ticketboxoffice.aspx?row_count=2336628597&mid=151545&refreshdate=5/6/2012&tid=AAEGI
item.name: Movie Night: The Avengers
